mapper.sql: id, paper_name, paper_score, paper_time, answer_begin_time, answer_end_time, publish_user_id, publish_time, answer_user_id, class_id, student_num
mapper.select: SELECT paper.id ,course.course_name,class.class_name,paper.paper_name,paper.paper_time,paper.paper_score from paper left join course on course.id=paper.course_id LEFT join class on class.id=paper.class_id WHERE paper.publish_user_id=#{publishUserId}
SELECT paper.* from paper LEFT JOIN class on paper.class_id=class.id LEFT join class_user on class_user.class_id=class.id WHERE class_user.member_id=#{userId}

select paper_id,class_id,class_name,(get_score/total_score) good_rate from ( select p1.paper_id,c2.id,c2.class_name,sum(p1.score) total_score,sum(p2.score) get_score,p3.class_id from user_question p2 left join paper_question p1 on p1.id=p2.question_id left join class_user c1 on c1.member_id=p2.user_id left JOIN class c2 on c2.id=c1.class_id left join paper p3 on p3.id=p1.paper_id and p3.class_id=c2.id LEFT join course c3 on c3.class_id=c2.id WHERE p2.user_id is not null and p3.class_id is not NULL and c3.id=#{courseId} GROUP BY c2.id,c2.class_name,p1.paper_id,p3.class_id)a
